html.title: HTML Elements
html.content: HTML Elements are the building blocks of an HTML document.

html.title: Forms
html.content: HTML Forms allow users to enter data for submission.

html.title: Tables
html.content: HTML Tables are used to organize data in a tabular format.

css.title: Selectors
css.content: CSS Selectors are used to select and style elements.

css.title: Flexbox
css.content: Flexbox is a layout model that allows elements to align and distribute space dynamically.

css.title: Grid
css.content: CSS Grid layout allows you to create complex layouts with rows and columns.

javascript.title: Variables
javascript.content: JavaScript variables are used to store data.

javascript.title: Functions
javascript.content: Functions are reusable blocks of code in JavaScript.

javascript.title: Loops
javascript.content: Loops allow you to execute a block of code multiple times.

react.title: JSX
react.content: JSX allows writing HTML-like syntax in JavaScript.

react.title: State
react.content: State in React allows you to manage and track data changes within components.

react.title: Props
react.content: Props are used to pass data from one component to another in React.

angular.title: Directives
angular.content: Directives are markers on a DOM element that attach behavior to that element.

angular.title: Components
angular.content: Components are the building blocks of an Angular application.

angular.title: Services
angular.content: Services in Angular are used to share data and logic across components.

nodejs.title: HTTP Module
nodejs.content: Node.js HTTP module allows to create a web server.

nodejs.title: File System
nodejs.content: Node.js File System module allows interaction with the file system.

nodejs.title: Events
nodejs.content: Events in Node.js are signals that indicate something has happened in the application.

bootstrap.title: Grid System
bootstrap.content: Bootstrap's Grid System allows you to create responsive layouts easily.

bootstrap.title: Utilities
bootstrap.content: Bootstrap Utilities are helper classes for styling elements quickly.

bootstrap.title: Components
bootstrap.content: Bootstrap Components like modals, buttons, and navbars speed up development.

tailwind.title: Utility-First
tailwind.content: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom designs.

tailwind.title: Responsive Design
tailwind.content: Tailwind's responsive design utilities make it easy to build responsive layouts.

tailwind.title: Custom Themes
tailwind.content: Tailwind allows custom theming using configuration files.
